verses.verse: I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> the mercies <S%G3628><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, that ye present <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%>, holy <S%G40><s%>, acceptable <S%G2101><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>, which is your <S%G5216><s%> reasonable <S%G3050><s%> service <S%G2999><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G4964><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> conformed <S%G4964><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> world <S%G165><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> be ye transformed <S%G3339><s%> by the renewing <S%G342><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> may prove <S%G1381><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that good <S%G18><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> acceptable <S%G2101><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%>, will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, to every man <S%G3956><s%> that is <S%G5607><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> to think of himself more <S%G3844><s%> highly <S%G5252><s%> than <S%G3739><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to think <S%G5426><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> to think <S%G5426><s%> soberly <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4993><s%>, according as <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath dealt <S%G3307><s%> to every man <S%G1538><s%> the measure <S%G3358><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>. soberly: Gr. to sobriety

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> office <S%G4234><s%>:

So <S%G3779><s%> we <S%G2070><s%>, being many <S%G4183><s%>, are <S%G2070><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> one of another <S%G240><s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> gifts <S%G5486><s%> differing <S%G1313><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is given <S%G1325><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, let us prophesy according <S%G2596><s%> to the proportion <S%G356><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>;
Or <S%G1535><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%>, let us wait on <S%G1722><s%> our ministering <S%G1248><s%>: or <S%G1535><s%> he that teacheth <S%G1321><s%>, on <S%G1722><s%> teaching <S%G1319><s%>;

Or <S%G1535><s%> he that exhorteth <S%G3870><s%>, on <S%G1722><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%>: he that giveth <S%G3330><s%>, let him do it with <S%G1722><s%> simplicity <S%G572><s%>; he that ruleth <S%G4291><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%>; he that sheweth mercy <S%G1653><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> cheerfulness <S%G2432><s%>. giveth: or, imparteth with simplicity: or, liberally
Let love <S%G26><s%> be without dissimulation <S%G505><s%>. Abhor <S%G655><s%> that which is evil <S%G4190><s%>; cleave <S%G2853><s%> to that which is good <S%G18><s%>.

Be kindly affectioned <S%G5387><s%> one to another <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240><s%> with brotherly love <S%G5360><s%>; in honour <S%G5092><s%> preferring <S%G4285><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>; with: or, in the love of the brethren
Not <S%G3361><s%> slothful <S%G3636><s%> in business <S%G4710><s%>; fervent <S%G2204><s%> in spirit <S%G4151><s%>; serving <S%G1398><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>;
Rejoicing <S%G5463><s%> in hope <S%G1680><s%>; patient <S%G5278><s%> in tribulation <S%G2347><s%>; continuing instant <S%G4342><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%>;
Distributing <S%G2841><s%> to the necessity <S%G5532><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%>; given <S%G1377><s%> to hospitality <S%G5381><s%>.
Bless <S%G2127><s%> them which persecute <S%G1377><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: bless <S%G2127><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> curse <S%G2672><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them that do rejoice <S%G5463><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> weep <S%G2799><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them that weep <S%G2799><s%>.

Be of the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> one toward another <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240><s%>. Mind <S%G5426><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> high things <S%G5308><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> condescend <S%G4879><s%> to men of low estate <S%G5011><s%>. Be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> in <S%G3844><s%> your own conceits <S%G1438><s%>. condescend: or, be contented with mean things

Recompense <S%G591><s%> to no man <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for <S%G473><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>. Provide <S%G4306><s%> things honest <S%G2570><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> it be possible <S%G1415><s%>, as much as lieth in <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, live peaceably <S%G1514><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.

Dearly beloved <S%G27><s%>, avenge <S%G1556><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> rather give <S%G1325><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> unto wrath <S%G3709><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> is mine <S%G1698><s%>; I <S%G1473><s%> will repay <S%G467><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> enemy <S%G2190><s%> hunger <S%G3983><s%>, feed <S%G5595><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; if <S%G1437><s%> he thirst <S%G1372><s%>, give <S%G4222><s%> him <S%G846><s%> drink <S%G4222><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> in so <S%G5124><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> thou shalt heap <S%G4987><s%> coals <S%G440><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%>.
Be <S%G3528><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> good <S%G18><s%>.
